verses.verse: After<WH310> Abimelech<WH40> there arose<WH6965> to save<WH3467> Israel<WH3478> Tola<WH8439> the son<WH1121> of Puah,<WH6312> the son<WH1121> of Dodo,<WH1734> a man<WH376> of Issachar;<WH3485> and he lived<WH3427> in Shamir<WH8069> in the hill<WH2022> country of Ephraim.<WH669>
He judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478> twenty<WH6242> - three<WH7969> years,<WH8141> and died,<WH4191> and was buried<WH6912> in Shamir.<WH8069>
After<WH310> him arose<WH6965> Jair,<WH2971> the Gileadite;<WH1569> and he judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478> twenty<WH6242> - two<WH8147> years.<WH8141>

He had thirty<WH7970> sons<WH1121> who rode<WH7392> on thirty<WH7970> donkey colts,<WH5895> and they had thirty<WH7970> cities,<WH5892> which are called<WH7121> Havvoth Jair<WH2334> to this day,<WH3117> which are in the land<WH776> of Gilead.<WH1568>
Jair<WH2971> died,<WH4191> and was buried<WH6912> in Kamon.<WH7056>

The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> again<WH3254> did<WH6213> that which was evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and served<WH5647> the Baals,<WH1168> and the Ashtaroth,<WH6252> and the gods<WH430> of Syria,<WH758> and the gods<WH430> of Sidon,<WH6721> and the gods<WH430> of Moab,<WH4124> and the gods<WH430> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon,<WH5983> and the gods<WH430> of the Philistines;<WH6430> and they forsook<WH5800> Yahweh,<WH3068> and didn't<WH5647> serve him.

The anger<WH639> of Yahweh<WH3068> was kindled<WH2734> against Israel,<WH3478> and he sold<WH4376> them into the hand<WH3027> of the Philistines,<WH6430> and into the hand<WH3027> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon.<WH5983>

They troubled<WH7492> and oppressed<WH7533> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> that year.<WH8083> For eighteen years,<WH8141> they oppressed<WH7533> all the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> that were beyond<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383> in the land<WH776> of the Amorites,<WH567> which is in Gilead.<WH1568>

The children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983> passed over<WH5674> the Jordan<WH3383> to fight<WH3898> also against Judah,<WH3063> and against Benjamin,<WH1144> and against the house<WH1004> of Ephraim;<WH669> so that Israel<WH3478> was very<WH3966> distressed.<WH3334>

The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> cried<WH2199> to Yahweh,<WH3068> saying,<WH559> "We have sinned<WH2398> against you,<WH5800> even because we have forsaken our God,<WH430> and have served<WH5647> the Baals.<WH1168>"

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> "Didn't<WH4714> I save you from the Egyptians, and from the Amorites,<WH567> from the children<WH1121> of Ammon,<WH5983> and from the Philistines?<WH6430>
The Sidonians<WH6722> also,<WH6002> and the Amalekites, and the Maonites,<WH4584> oppressed<WH3905> you;<WH6817> and you cried to me,<WH3467> and I saved you out of their hand.<WH3027>
Yet you have forsaken<WH5800> me,<WH5647> and served other<WH312> gods:<WH430> therefore I will save<WH3467> you no more.<WH3254>
Go<WH3212> and cry<WH2199> to the gods<WH430> which you have chosen.<WH977> Let them<WH1992> save<WH3467> you in the time<WH6256> of your distress!<WH6869>"

The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> said<WH559> to Yahweh,<WH3068> "We have sinned:<WH2398> do<WH6213> you to us whatever seems<WH5869> good<WH2896> to you;<WH5337> only deliver us,<WH3117> please, this day."
They put away<WH5493> the foreign<WH5236> gods<WH430> from among<WH7130> them,<WH5647> and served Yahweh;<WH3068> and his soul<WH5315> was grieved<WH7114> for the misery<WH5999> of Israel.<WH3478>

Then the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983> were gathered together,<WH6817> and encamped<WH2583> in Gilead.<WH1568> The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> assembled themselves together,<WH622> and encamped<WH2583> in Mizpah.<WH4709>

The people,<WH5971> the princes<WH8269> of Gilead,<WH1568> said<WH559> one<WH376> to another,<WH7453> "What man<WH376> is he who will begin<WH2490> to fight<WH3898> against the children<WH1121> of Ammon?<WH5983> He shall be head<WH7218> over all the inhabitants<WH3427> of Gilead.<WH1568>"
